byline.original: By PETER BAKER and ERIC SCHMITT

abstract: Islamic State takes credit for terror attacks targeted at Russia, Beirut and now Paris, demonstrating an international reach global leaders previously thought impossible; events assert group as international threat.
lead_paragraph: With lethal strikes against Russia, in Lebanon, and now in Paris, the Islamic State shows its chilling reach, and becomes a broader threat.

headline.main: Paris Terror Attacks May Prompt More Aggressive U.S. Strategy on ISIS
headline.print_headline: Attacks May Prompt Hardening of U.S. Strategy on ISIS

snippet: With lethal strikes against Russia, in Lebanon, and now in Paris, the Islamic State shows its chilling reach, and becomes a broader threat.
